DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The first measure (degrees) shall be between -360 and 360 degree.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The second measure (minutes) shall be between -60 and 60.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR3
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The third measure (seconds) shall be between -60 and 60.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR4
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The measure components shall have the same sign (positive or negative).
